price: Na shikeni Swala, na toeni Zaka, na mt'iini Mtume, ili mpate kurehemewa.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
footnotes: Na shikeni Swala kwa ukamilifu wa nguzo katika utulivu na unyenyekevu, ili ipate kuwa inazuia uchafu na mambo mabaya. Na wapeni Zaka wanao stahiki. Na mt'iini Mtume kwa yote anayo kuamrisheni, ili mpate kutaraji rehema ya Mwenyezi Mungu na radhi yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
